name: The TNS Group
tag_list: it, it-support, it-consulting, ct-it-firm, information-technology-firm-ct, it-support-ct
overview: The TNS Group is a full service IT Consulting Firm based in Stamford, Connecticut. Since 1996, TNS has been providing its customers with the highest quality technology services, an informed staff of IT support personnel and reliable business advisors. TNS works within five practice areas: Security & Privacy, Business Continuity, IT Business Consulting, Network Infrastructure, and Managed Services. By coordinating these efforts together with clients, TNS is able to compose a comprehensive plan to help clients achieve their information technology goals. TNS runs on a W-2 based employment model, and features engineers competent in MAC and Windows platforms, and works across a wide variety of industries.
